name: Robot City Stadium
description: Robot City Stadium is a competitive multiplayer disc-combat sport focused on skill, nuance, and mastery.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
